item.title: Appreciation for DaanCorona!
item.description:
DaanCorona is an online platform for selling vouchers for India's largely undigitized small and medium businesses. You can find it here - https://daancorona.tech

I built DaanCorona along with 16 others during the COVID-19 lockdown. In these efforts I wore many hats (ideation, legal, etc) - my role was that of …

item.title: Cheat Dare2Compete - Host events as an individual
item.description:
Dare2Compete aggregates information about competitions, internships, jobs, quizzes, and hackathons.
There's healthy participation from E-School and B-School students from all over the country.
Dare2Compete works on the platform business model, it provides you the ability to host event for free and only charges a fee when you promote an event …

item.title: Interviewing Erin McKean
item.description: Recently, I got a chance to interview Erin McKean, lexicographer extraordinaire, author of over half a dozen books, and founder at Wordnik, the world's biggest online English dictionary by number of words. item.title: Following Ma.tt Mullenweg
item.description:
At 19, Matt Mullenweg founded WordPress, which powers 34% of all websites, and is arguably the majority stakeholder of the internet.

item.title: Setting up a Pelican Blog on Windows
item.description:
A first post on how I built this simplistic static blog/personal website using Pelican and hosted it on Github Pages.
